description:
eeezap – Everything Made Easy!
Welcome to eeezap, the multi-service app for the Maldives. Designed to simplify your daily life, eeezap offers a range of services, including ride-hailing, food delivery, grocery shopping, and on-demand home services—all in one app. Our platform connects vendors and customers while providing skilled professionals with an opportunity to showcase their talents and grow their reach.
Why Choose eeezap?
Comprehensive Convenience: eeezap combines multiple services in a single app, so you no longer need to switch between apps for different needs. From rides to groceries, everything is at your fingertips.
Empowering Local Businesses: eeezap helps vendors and skilled professionals reach more customers. Whether you're a restaurant owner, plumber, or tutor, eeezap is your platform to connect with the community.
Community-Focused: By supporting local vendors and creating job opportunities, eeezap contributes to strengthening the local economy.
Key Features of eeezap
Ride-Hailing: Reliable transportation options for work, outings, or errands. Choose the vehicle that fits your needs and enjoy safe, timely rides.
Food Delivery: Explore and order from a variety of local restaurants, with meals delivered fresh to your door.
Grocery Delivery: Shop for daily essentials from local stores without leaving your home, saving time and effort.
On-Demand Services: Book skilled professionals for cleaning, plumbing, electrical repairs, and more—available whenever you need them.
Seamless Payments: Pay easily using the in-app wallet, credit cards, or third-party payment methods, ensuring secure and hassle-free transactions.
How eeezap Works
Download the app and create your account.
Explore the available services, from ride-hailing to on-demand tasks.
Place orders, book rides, or schedule services with just a few taps.
For vendors and service providers, manage services and communicate with customers easily through the app.
Get Started with eeezap Today!
Simplify your life with eeezap, the Maldives' all-in-one app for rides, food, groceries, and services. Download now to experience convenience like never before!

Stay connected to the one you love, even when you’re apart. Join your partner on Couple Joy to have fun together, strengthen your bond, and discover new things about each other.

STAY CONNECTED

- Personalize your screen with adorable couple widgets.
- Share your mood and see how your partner is feeling in real-time.
- Track the distance between you and watch it shrink as you get closer to seeing each other.
- Celebrate your love by tracking how long you’ve been together.

GET TO KNOW EACH OTHER

- Play fun games and uncover new sides of your partner.
- Build intimacy with meaningful daily questions.
- Chat in real-time about your quiz answers for deeper connections.

GROW TOGETHER

- Watch your relationship thrive as you extend your daily streak.
- Count down to birthdays, anniversaries, and exciting future plans!
- Capture your journey together with photos in your shared journal.

Couple Joy has everything you need to make your relationship even more special. It’s the perfect space to have fun, create lasting memories, and stay close—no matter the distance.

Download Couple Joy and invite your partner today!

Terms of Use: https://couplejoyapp.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://couplejoyapp.com/privacy
Contact us: contact@couplejoy.app

Spark connection, laughter, and intimacy with Loverzz, the all-in-one app for couples.

Whether you are in a long-distance relationship, newlyweds, or dating, Loverzz helps you grow closer through daily games, home screen widgets, and deep conversations.

Discover what your partner really thinks. One partner answers, the other guesses. Match answers to score points, unlock relationship insights, and ignite meaningful conversations.

DRAWING & WIDGETS
Send love notes directly to your partner's Home Screen. Use our drawing tools to sketch cute doodles or send photo widgets to keep your presence felt, no matter the distance. It is the perfect way to stay connected throughout the day without saying a word.

DAILY QUESTIONS & QUIZZES
From Future Dreams to Intimacy, explore over 13 categories designed to spark conversation. You answer honestly, your partner guesses your answer to see who knows who best. It turns serious relationship building into a fun, low-pressure game.

RELATIONSHIP INSIGHTS
Track your connection across 6 key dimensions: Vision, Intimacy, Adventure, Life Habits, Social Dynamics, and Crisis Management. Watch your understanding grow with visual progress tracking and compatibility scores.

PERFECT FOR LONG DISTANCE
Bridge the gap with digital interactions. The combination of real-time quizzes and Home Screen widgets makes Loverzz the ultimate tool for long-distance couples to stay synced and close, even when miles apart.

13 CONVERSATION CATEGORIES
Avoid running out of things to say. Our card packs range from fun to profound, including Future Dreams, Relationship Growth, Social Situations, Travel Adventures, Family, Career, and Intimacy.

WHY CHOOSE LOVERZZ
- Daily couples questions to build connection rituals
- Drawing and photo widgets for your Home Screen
- Deep conversation starters mixed with fun games
- Designed specifically for couples who want to grow closer

Join thousands of couples making Loverzz their daily habit. Because truly knowing your partner is the ultimate relationship goal.

Download Loverzz now and start your journey to a deeper connection.

*Some features require subscription.

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals
- Rematch with expired connections — so you don’t miss out on a great potential date
- Browse anonymously with Incognito Mode and only seen by who you want to see you
- Extend your matches by 24 hours
- Swipe as much as you like to meet more people
- Tap into dating scenes around the world with Travel Mode
- Stand out and get noticed with free SuperSwipes & Spotlights, refreshed weekly

Inclusivity is key
At Bumble, we promise to support and include all forms of love: straight, gay, lesbian, queer, and beyond. We want everyone in our community to feel safe and welcome. So no matter how you identify, if you're looking for a place to chat, date, and find real love, we’ve got what you’re looking for.

---
Bumble is a free dating app to download and use. We offer optional subscription packages (Bumble Boost & Bumble Premium) and non-subscription, single, and multi-use paid features (Bumble Spotlight & Bumble SuperSwipe). Your personal data is securely processed in line with our privacy policy and applicable laws—be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions.
https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms
Bumble Inc. is the parent company of Bumble, Badoo, and BumbleBFF, social networks, and dating apps free to download and use.

See how new HAIR COLORS fits you before making a real change. Test shades with AI Color Changer. Stay ahead of hair trends with AI HairApp, best tool for virtual hair styles and color analysis with Hair Style Change Simulator!

ThatPetApp is the ultimate solution for pet owners to ensure their pets receive the best care possible. Say goodbye to misplaced records, missed reminders, and lost photos of health issues. ThatPetApp is designed to eliminate these frustrations and provide you with peace of mind. Keep all your pet’s information in one place, set up tailored reminders and notifications, share vital details with family or pet sitters and track your pet’s health effortlessly. 
Developed by a Melbourne veterinary surgeon of 25 years to help pet owners care for their pets in the very best way they can. We understand the frustrations of missing records, incorrect reminders, and misplaced photos of health conditions like lumps, coughs, or limps. ThatPetApp is designed to help you ensure your pet’s medical needs are always up to date and critical records are readily available, especially in emergencies.
Share information on the same subscription to family or friends who are caring for your pets to ensure they don’t miss key parts of their routine or reminders. Record and track weight and health including photos according to vet recommendations. Help us to continuously progress the app with suggestions of further features or improvements, our goal is an app that will give owners peace of mind that your pets medical needs are always up to date.
KEY FEATURES
1. Track Reminders & Health Medications: 
Never miss a vet appointment, medication dose, or grooming session with our easy-to-set reminders. See clearly on one page each pet's routine reminders or medications. Tailored to each pet, these reminders ensure your pets stay healthy and happy, helping you manage conditions like arthritis with ease.
2. Comprehensive Health Records: 
Store all your pet’s vital information in one secure place. From vaccination records to medical history, keep everything organized and accessible whenever you need it.
3. Share Pet Information:
Easily share your pet’s profile with family and friends. Whether you’re on vacation or at work, ensure consistent care by allowing carers to access important details and reminders through sharing.
4. Monitor Growth & Weight:
Track your pet’s weight and growth with photos and notes. See changes with a handy graph. Follow veterinary recommendations on diet and keep a close eye on your pet’s health progress.
5. Manage Contacts & Notes:
Keep track of important contacts such as your vet, pet sitters, and grooming services. Jot down any notes related to your pet’s care and health for quick reference.
6. User-Friendly Interface:
ThatPetApp is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, making it simple for anyone to manage their pet’s care.
Download ThatPetApp today.
Terms of Use: https://www.thatpetapp.com/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://www.thatpetapp.com/privacy-policy/

Step into Sumi, where conversations become something more than words. Here, you don’t just chat — you connect with AI characters who each have their own stories, emotions, and personalities. Every character feels alive in their own way, remembering your past interactions and growing more familiar with you over time. Sumi turns simple exchanges into something warm, creative, and deeply personal.

Customize your experience by setting unique chat backgrounds that reflect each character’s world and mood. Watch as your favorite characters evolve and even earn special popularity tags based on how often you interact with them — a little nod to your most cherished connections.

Whether you’re seeking comfort, curiosity, or inspiration, Sumi offers a space where imagination meets emotion. Every chat becomes an unfolding story, written between you and your AI companion — a story that’s yours alone.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

Looking for the perfect love app?

Couple Widget lets you check your days together and automatically reminds you of special anniversaries. Record your Love Story and first moments, then share them with your partner to stay close.

With Couple Widget:

* Keep every moment: a “Days Together” counter that shows your time in real time from the first day to now

* Never miss an anniversary: reminders for 10/100 days, the day before, and more

* Love Story: a couple’s diary to record memories with photos

* First Moments: record your first memories together and express the feeling with emojis

* Couple Connect: stay close by commenting on and liking each other’s posts

* Personalize your widget: create your own Home Screen with themes and couple photos

* Simple & intuitive: anyone can add and edit widgets with ease

* Couple Calendar: see anniversaries at a glance and write freely!

Download Couple Widget and make every day a little more special!

Phone Tracker - Family Locator is an application that uses GPS technology to help you locate and keep track of your family members, friends, and loved ones in real-time on a live, private map. With Circles, you can create a group of people who share their locations within the group, so you can easily track their location history and current location. Invite members by sharing a unique, private 6-digit number, and once they accept the invitation, you can locate them on the map at any time.

The app also includes geofence zones, which allow you to know when any of your circle members enter or leave a certain area by creating a location-based boundary. You can drop a pin on the map to set the center of the geofence at a specific location, name your geolocation, set the radius for it, and get push notifications when someone enters or exits it. This feature can help you ensure that your loved ones are safe by automatically letting you know their whereabouts, without any effort from them.

In case of emergencies, the app includes an SOS function that sends an urgent push notification to all members of your circle when you tap on the SOS button, along with a live update of your location. This feature ensures that your child, partner, or friend can alert you any time they need help or are in danger.

Other features of the app include the ability to view the location history of each circle member, find a lost device using the GPS phone tracker, and manage group circles and geofence zones.

Phone Tracker is your reliable GPS-based family locator and personal tracking app, designed to help keep your loved ones safe. It is not intended for spying or secret surveillance, and it cannot be installed remotely or without consent. To use the service, the user must install the app manually and approve the location-sharing request. By subscribing you can enjoy unlimited alerts, real-time tracking, extended location history and many more features!

The world’s largest free social styling & wardrobe app (9 M+ users). Built to help you love your wardrobe.
“Revolutionised the way I dress and shop” – Vogue. Also loved by The New York Times,  BBC,  The Guardian,  The Drew Barrymore Show + 100s more.

We’re reprogramming our relationship with fashion – helping you organise your wardrobe to gain personal insights and inspiration. See what you own, what you wear and how you wear it, giving you the freedom to style your way while reclaiming your love for your closet and reshaping habits to reconnect with what makes you, you.

Whering is your wardrobe’s search engine, stylist and shopping sense‑check built into one, finding outfit inspiration from what you already own and future‑proofing purchases before they ever hit your wardrobe.

DIGITAL WARDROBE & ORGANISATION

Your closet, no limits.
Curate your wardrobe in seconds.
Add clothes from our database of over 100 million items.
Add images directly from retailer websites.
Add your own photos – we’ll remove the background.
Download our Chrome Extension and digitise as you go.
See everything you own in one place – it’s your wardrobe in your hands.

SEE AND STYLE MILLIONS OF WARDROBES

Inspiration evolved.
See friends’ wardrobes – or connect with new ones.
Add items directly from any other wardrobe to yours.
Create and share outfits with friends using style submissions.
Add friends’ outfits to your Moodboards for non‑stop inspiration.
See and save outfits created by those who know your style.
Save items from your friends’ wishlist to yours in one click.

DISCOVER YOUR STYLE WITH DATA‑DRIVEN INSIGHTS

Your wardrobe – powered by analytics.
Cost‑Per‑Wear: True ROI—spot your best investments.
Wear Rate: Track how often you rock each piece.
Intake Tracking: Log new vs. pre‑loved buys and monitor your shift to sustainable style.
Colour Palette: See your go‑to hues and gaps.
Wardrobe Longevity: Measure item lifespan, track net additions, and retire under‑loved pieces responsibly.

PERSONAL STYLING AND OUTFIT PLANNING

Style is personal and our outfits are too.
Shuffle your wardrobe with our Clueless‑inspired outfit creator “Dress Me”.
Get creative and save all your outfits in one place – never forget a good look.
Lacking inspiration? Get a Style Pass and try our Outfit Maker.
Start outfit planning for events in the Whering outfit planner to always feel your best.
Create lookbooks to categorise and organise all your outfits.
Save the time and stress of deciding what to wear.

PACKING AND TRAVEL OUTFIT PLANNING

Travel ready, stress free.
Avoid overpacking, baggage fees and forgetful packing with Whering Packing Lists.
Never miss an essential with smart reminders.
Shop your own wardrobe to curb impulse buys.

WISHLISTS & MOODBOARDS

Your style, your way.
Wishlists: Save and curate all of the clothes you want in one place.
Moodboards: Collect all your style inspiration in one spot.

WHO WE ARE

Digital Wardrobe · Wardrobe Organisation · Virtual Closet · Personal Styling · Outfit Planner · Outfit Maker · Outfit Generator · AI Fashion Assistant · Style Analytics · Wardrobe Management · Capsule Wardrobe · Sustainable Fashion · Second‑Hand Shopping · Clueless Wardrobe · Packing Travel List · Fashion Wishlist · Fashion Moodboard · Style Community · Clothing Inventory · Cost‑Per‑Wear Tracking

Your search is over: this is where curiosity and honesty meet to create magical dates! 16+ million open-minded singles exploring and keeping it real.

No matter what kind of relationship you're seeking, you're in control—express openly whether you're looking for something SERIOUS or CASUAL.
DOWN is the most honest dating app for hot and open-minded singles to connect, express themselves freely, and find what they truly want.

Discover your dating life in a private and secure space.

Your privacy and safety are our top priorities. We employ robust measures, including a photo verification process, to proactively identify and mitigate against bad actors and scammers, aiming to create a safe environment for you to match and chat with nearby singles. To enhance your safety and provide a more authentic experience, all users must now be photo-verified! We're committed to combating inauthentic accounts to improve your experience, verifying all our users right from the start. This requirement applies immediately to new users and is being gradually rolled out for existing users.

DOWN is the perfect app for singles seeking casual relationships, long-term commitments, or anything in between.

Find attractive singles near you. Flirt, meet, date, and have fun every day!
Be straightforward and date the honest way: If you're seeking a quick fling or casual fun, say "GET DOWN." If you're looking for something more serious, say "GET DATE." It's that simple—you choose!
Match, say hello, chat, and find great connections for free, and go on dates with your matches! Over half of all matches on DOWN APP meet in real life.
Join our community of over 16 million users globally chatting, matching, and dating.
How DOWN Works:
Sign up once with a Mobile Number, Apple ID, or Facebook to verify your identity (don't worry—we NEVER post to your Facebook wall!).
Like hot singles nearby: We will only inform them if they’re interested in you too!
When we confirm you’re both interested in chatting or ready to date, we’ll notify you so you can meet!
The app is free to download and use. We also offer an optional subscription package called DOWN Private Membership.

Subscribe to access DOWN's premium features and enjoy all the advantages—giving you the best chances of success.
Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account upon purchase.
If you choose the subscription option, it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period, which will outline the renewal cost.
Subscriptions can be managed by the user, and auto-renewal can be turned off through the user's Account Settings after purchase.
No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
All personal data is handled in accordance with DOWN's privacy policy. More details can be found here: https://www.downapp.com/privacy.

Terms and Conditions can be found here: https://www.downapp.com/terms.

Boost your dating confidence with Badoo— the dating app that makes it easy to express your true self.
 
It’s an encouraging, safe space that’s designed to help you make more meaningful connections.
 
How? By keeping it simple, helping you take action with confidence, and giving you the features and support you need to find whatever you’re searching for. Whether that’s dates, a long-term relationship, new friends, or chats.

Plus, with our latest tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, you can say hello to a fun and authentic dating experience. 
 
Download Badoo to take your dating confidence to another level."

Back yourself
On Badoo, it’s all about celebrating you and staying true to your needs. With our various features, it’s easy to put yourself out there with confidence.
Trust your experience
Badoo is a platform that prioritises authenticity. Profile photos can be verified and there are strict user guidelines in place.

How Badoo works
Focusing on who you are and what you want, here are some features making it easier for you to meet your kind of people:  
-Advanced Filters: Finesse your search, and save your time
-Profile Questions: Easily champion your personality
- People Nearby: Meet daters around you
- Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right to connect and left for skip
- Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling
- Verified profiles: We have a three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends
- Blur intimate photos: Using AI, our Private Detector feature detects explicit photos and will let you decide if you want to view or block the image
- Deception Detector: Our new tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, so you can have a fun and authentic dating experience"

Go Premium
Maximise your dating experience. When you upgrade to Badoo Premium, you’ll unlock plenty of features that will make it even easier to find meaningful connections:

- See who's already liked you
- Find exactly what you’re looking for with unlimited Advanced Filters
- Get your messages read first
- Send unlimited likes
 - Control who sees your profile with Invisible Mode
- Undo accidental left swipes  
- And much more...

The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. PURE is a dating app for curious people to show up in their most playful version of themselves. It’s a space to be honest with your intentions and clear in your boundaries.

Connect with like-minded community to create and explore new exciting experiences in a safe and supportive space.

Let your imagination go wild and get ready for amazing dates!

* HOW PURE WORKS?
Everything starts with Personal Ads. To see other people in the feed, you need to post your Ad. Write what kind of experience you are looking for and find someone who would share the same experience with you. Be creative and original with your ads, that's always appealing.

* IN PURE ALL BORDERS ARE OPEN
Paris, New-York or London? You can check any city worldwide and meet people from PURE community from around the globe.  

* WHAT HAPPENS IN PURE STAYS IN PURE
Photos self-destruct right after being seen, and in case someone takes a screenshot, you will get a notification about that. Also, all chat messages, including photos and audio, shared in chats cannot be saved to the phone's gallery.

* OUR MISSION IS TO KEEP PURE A PURE EXPERIENCE
Safety of our community is one of our key priorities. We are constantly improving our algorithms to find and get rid of scam and spam accounts, also our system sends automatic alerts on trigger words that might be used by scammers, so don't be surprised in case you will get a warning. 
Keep chatting anonymously via PURE and do not switch to other messengers. You know what they say: better safe than sorry. 

PURE uses auto-renewing subscriptions — you have to subscribe to get inside.
Here’s what you should know about PURE subscriptions:

- If you choose to purchase a weekly, monthly or annual subscription you will be able to go online and interact via chats with other users during the chosen subscription period. The prices may vary per country and are subject to change with a notice. Prices are clearly displayed in the app.
- All subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period without any limitations.
- Auto-renewal can be canceled at any time by going to your settings in the Apple Store after the purchase.
- All personal data is handled under PURE’s privacy policy https://pure.app/content/en/privacy
- Terms and conditions: https://pure.app/terms/
TTLock is used to open the door via bluetooth with your phone. To do this, APP should cowork with specific hardware. You can contact with us in the APP, if there is any question.

description:
Step into Jiely, where conversations become experiences and every dialogue reveals a new world. Here, you don’t just chat—you connect with AI characters who think, feel, and express themselves with unique stories, personalities, and emotions. Whether it’s an art enthusiast exploring creative thoughts, a sports lover sharing energy and passion, or a curious mind diving into research and discovery, each interaction feels alive and personal.

Jiely invites you into four distinct worlds: Enjoy Sports, Discussing Art, Research and Academics, and Food Contest. Within each theme, you’ll meet characters who bring their world to life through intelligent, dynamic conversation. Tap in, and a new companion will appear—ready to listen, debate, laugh, and inspire.

Built for those who crave authentic digital connection and creative dialogue, Jiely transforms casual chat into something deeper and more meaningful. Every encounter is unpredictable, every story is original, and every conversation leaves you wanting to explore just a little more.

AirDroid Parental Control App is designed for your child's safety as a priority. With the high safety features provided by AirDroid Parental Control, you can easily get in touch with your child when they are not around you or they can't respond to you on time. Find your child in a tap, extremely easy!

We're able to  access iOS devices now, including features like:
• Daily downtime and app limits are set by the Parent App.
• Website and app usage monitoring on the child’s device.
• App blocking like inappropriate browsers, games, and social apps on the child’s device
• Website blocking and category blocking such as games, gambling, and lockout of unwanted content on the child’s device
• Safe search and custom black-and-white list on the child’s device
• Location tracking of the child's device
• Advanced reporting provided to parents
• Real-time alerts sent to parents
 
The latest online monitor, content filter, and anti-cyberbullying functions have been released, which could improve the performance of kids' safeguards and ensure your loved child is always under perfect protection built by you.
  
What makes you choose AirDroid Parental Control: 
· Real-time monitoring - Cast your child's device screen to your phone in real time to find out what apps they're using in school and the frequency of use to prevent them from getting addicted to their phone.
· Sync app notification - Real-time sync function helps you to know more about your child's chat on social media like Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, etc. Help your child to stay far away from cyberbullying and online fraud. 
· Screen time - Set up a unique schedule for your child to limit their use time and prevent them from focusing on it while having class. 
· App blocker - Set up phone access permission to ensure your child can only access the permitted app, also you will get an alert when your child tries to install or delete apps. 
· GPS location tracker - With the high-accuracy location tracker, you can track your child's location on the map and see their historical route for the day. Ensure your child is safe and they won't visit any high-risk places.
· Location alert - Custom Geofence to your child, you will receive alerts when they pass, just like a 24/7 guard to follow and protect your child.
· Battery check - Monitor your child's device charging status, once the device's power is running low, a notification will be sent to their phone to remind your child to charge their phone in time, always stay in touch! 
 
 
To activate AirDroid Parental Control would be super easy:
1. Install 'AirDroid Parental Control' on your phone.
2. Connect your kids' devices by the invited link or code. 
3. Install 'AirDroid Kids' successfully. 
4. Link your account with your kid's device, then it works.
To use AirDroid Parental Control you will need to download the app onto each device you wish to control. One paid account allows you to control up to 10 devices.
AirDroid Parental Control contains no advertisements.
AirDroid Parental Control app offers a 3-day free trial of all Premium features. When the trial is over, access to features requires a subscription, with discounts for longer commitments.
 
The cost of a subscription will be debited from your iTunes account. The subscription will automatically be renewed at chosen intervals unless canceled more than 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. Subscription management is available in the settings of your iTunes account after purchase.

 
Please make sure you have read the following before you use AirDroid Parental Control.
Privacy Policy: https://kids.airdroid.info/#/Privacy
Terms of Service: https://kids.airdroid.info/#/Eula
Payment Terms: https://kids.airdroid.info/#/Payment
 
Contact Us:
 
For any further suggestions or questions, please feel free to contact us at support@airdroid.com
